title: Haircut
desc: Signature cutting techniques, our highly skilled teams will create a bespoke look to suit your individuality, lifestyle, and hair texture.

title: Hair Styling
desc: Our hair stylists are some of the top hairdressers.Their diverse hair styling talents will make your first choice whether you have long or short hair.

title: Makeup
desc: We offer makeup application services for women in Coral Gables and Brickell with a sense of style. We wll apply your makeup to suit whatever the special occasion.

title: Hair Coloring
desc: Your colour expert will listen to your colour goals and needs whilst assessing your skin tone, eye colour and hair texture and make every occasion very precious.
